text: Tjalling Charles Koopmans (August 28, 1910 â€“ February 26, 1985) was a Dutch- American mathematician and economist. He was the joint winner with Leonid Kantorovich of the 1975 Nobel Prize in Economic Sciences. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:1985 deaths Category:Dutch mathematicians Category:American economists Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States
